xml.brief: Retrieve GGZ file for newer Garmin devices

desc.p: Important note: This method is in beta version. It's interface may change in a backward-incompatible manner, or it may even be removed.
Produce a GGZ file (which is actually a zip file) with content compatible with newer Geocaching-enabled Garmin GPS devices.
The method bahaves exactly as services/caches/formatters/gpx method, and takes the same parameters. Only output format is different.

returns.p: A GGZ file. You should copy the file to Garmin's internal memory storage.
